name: European Acoustics Association
membership: EAA is international affiliate of International Commission on Acoustics
goal: The European Acoustics Association (EAA) – Asociación Europea de Acústica, from hereon referred to as the ASSOCIATION, is a non-profit entity established for a period of unlimited duration, with the purpose of promoting the development of the science of acoustics, its technologies and its applications, and including in its membership the associations in European countries interested in the objectives of the ASSOCIATION. https://www.euracoustics.org/
interests: Public Health, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: The EAA is mainly concerned by scienfific publishing and organization of scientific conferences
